 Promotion for new prepaid subscribers in February - Prepaid Starterkit (KM trả trước hòa mạng T2/2012). 
 1. Eligible subscribers: 
 
 
 Prepaid Starterkit of MobiCard, Mobi4U và MobiQ, with the available credits of 50.000 and 60.000 VND. 
 
 
 Other StarterKits change to MobiCard, Mobi4U and MobiQ before activation. 
 
 
 2. Benefits: 
  
 a. Promotion after activation: 
  
 
 
 
 
 Kind of Starterkit 
 
 
 Free Credits 
 
 
 Promotion right after activation  
 
 
 Total Credits Given After Top-up 
 
 
 
 
 KM2 
 
 
 KM3 
 
 
 Total Bonus 
 
 
 
 
 65.000đ 
 
 
 50.000đ 
 
 
 32.000đ 
 
 
 18.000đ 
 
 
 50.000đ 
 
 
 100.000đ 
 
 
 
 
 75.000đ 
 
 
 60.000đ 
 
 
 39.000đ 
 
 
 21.000đ 
 
 
 60.000đ 
 
 
 120.000đ 
 
 
 
 
 
 Additional 18 days applies for MobiCard Starterkit right after activation (total of 30 days ). 
 In 30 days from activation date , if the MC , 4U , MQ subscribers convert to other subscription plan, it will be withdrawed all bonus account (including KM2 and KM3 ). 
 
 b. Promotion for next 10 top-up: 
 
 Recharge before the subscription is inactive and before 9/06/2012. 
 Especially, MobiCard will be duplicated usage days. 
 
 - Up to 50% EXTRA top-up credits as following:

 1. &#51201;&#50857;&#48276;&#50948; :

 Mobicard &#49900;&#52852;&#46300;&#47484; &#44060;&#53685; &#49884; &#49324;&#50857;&#44592;&#44036;&#51008; 18 &#51068; &#45908; &#51060;&#50857; &#44032;&#45733;&#54633;&#45768;&#45796; . ( &#52509; &#49324;&#50857;&#44592;&#44036;&#51060; 30 &#51068;&#51060;&#45796; ) 
 &#44060;&#53685;&#49884;&#54980; 30 &#51068;&#44036;&#50640; MC, 4U, MQ &#49900;&#52852;&#46300; &#54805;&#53468;&#44032; &#45796;&#47480; &#54805;&#53468;&#47196; &#51204;&#54872;&#54616;&#47732; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; &#50836;&#44552;&#51060; &#45796; &#49548;&#51652;&#54633;&#45768;&#45796; .  b. &#50526;&#51004;&#47196; 10 &#48264;&#52649;&#51204; : &#51060; &#45796;&#51020;&#44284; &#44057;&#51008; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#51201;&#50857; :
